name: pocketdex
description: Pocketdex is an indexer for the Shannon implementation of the pocket network protocol.

scripts.vendor:setup: yarn vendor:cosmjs:install && yarn vendor:cosmjs:build && yarn vendor:subql:install && yarn install && yarn vendor:subql:build
scripts.vendor:cosmjs:install: cd vendor && yarn workspace cosmjs-monorepo-root install
scripts.vendor:cosmjs:build: cd vendor && yarn workspace cosmjs-monorepo-root run build
scripts.vendor:subql:build: cd vendor && yarn workspace @subql/node-cosmos run build
scripts.vendor:clean: cd vendor && find . -name node_modules | xargs rm -rf && find . -name dist | xargs rm -rf
scripts.build: subql codegen && sed -i 's/\[key: bigint\]/\[key: number\]/g' ./src/types/proto-interfaces/poktroll/application/application.ts && subql build
scripts.build:develop: NODE_ENV=develop subql codegen &&  sed -i 's/\[key: bigint\]/\[key: number\]/g' ./src/types/proto-interfaces/poktroll/application/application.ts && NODE_ENV=develop subql build
scripts.docker:start: docker compose pull && docker compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.docker:clean: yarn docker:stop && docker volume rm pocketdex_postgres_data
scripts.docker:tunnel: echo 'if public key auth fails the password is `proxypass`.' && ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -N -R 26657:localhost:26657 proxyuser@localhost -p 2222
scripts.docker:dev:local: docker compose up -d postgres pgadmin graphql-engine
scripts.dev:docker: subql codegen && subql build && docker compose pull && docker compose up --remove-orphans

author: Grove Team
